main event: An observation of a celestial explosion described as a bright bluish light that lit up the whole horizon for two minutes.
interesting points: The explosion was reported from a US Naval ship, USNS Croatan., The explosion created visible red centrals at the position of the event., The observation was made at a specific coordinate: 23-37.N 173-49W., The angle of observation was 42 degrees., The wind at the time was blowing from the WNW at 15 knots.
